meanings.definition: A person who believes that the pursuit of pleasure is the most important thing in life.
meanings.sent1: Some hedonists prioritize pleasure above all else.
meanings.sent2: The hedonists enjoyed every moment of the party.
meanings.sent3: The group of hedonists always found joy in the simplest things.
meanings.sent4: In a world of hedonists, happiness reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The hedonists reveled in the delightful sensations around them.

meanings.definition: Those who seek pleasure and avoid pain.
meanings.sent1: Hedonists often choose activities that bring them joy.
meanings.sent2: The hedonists avoided situations that caused discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The hedonists were like bees, always buzzing towards sweetness.
meanings.sent4: In a garden of hedonists, pain was a rare visitor.
meanings.sent5: The hedonists danced through life, savoring every moment of pleasure.
